title: What's Next for the Smart Toilets Market? - CleanLink
summary: The article discusses the growth of the global smart toilet market driven by water-saving technologies, with a focus on the demand for smart toilets in the commercial sector and the trend towards customized and germ-resistant toilet seats. Challenges include the preference for regular toilets in some developing countries and varying hygiene cultures.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes:  33711 - Wood Kitchen Cabinet and Countertop Manufacturing, 337127 - Institutional Furniture Manufacturing, 337215 - Showcase, Partition, Shelving, and Locker Manufacturing, 33721 - Office Furniture (including Fixtures) Manufacturing
